name: Project Chaos in Paradise
description:
In this platformer game, you'll join in Niferr's and Rimmi's adventure to fight against the Rangö government, ruled by Kiol and his 3 military generals.

Along the adventure, there will be a lot of obstacles for them to face, as well as betrayals and surprises from both sides. They may even discover that something's been living inside of them for a while now. Something that seems to be related to the Norse mythology. But it is just that, mythology, right? There's no way it could be real!

But, now that I think about it, the glove Niferr got is related to Norse mythology and can control elements with the runic inscriptions engraved on it... 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game is gonna get updated with the previous version of the build released on my Patreon.

If you want to support me and get access to the most recent build, as well as behind the scenes content like story, characters and music, head on to www.patreon.com/demonipo.
